App.name: Buy Say Sell
App.pleaseConnect: Please connect your wallet to use.

BriefIntro.begin: Buy Say Sell is a social community where you can:
BriefIntro.buyLong: Each post has one unique owner. Buy to own the post. Of course you can also create new posts without buying.
BriefIntro.sayLong: As the owner, you are the only one who can comment to the post. Say something.
BriefIntro.sellLong: List your post to the market. Who will buy your post? Why? How much? These are all up to you!
